people seem to love her character, but she just seems like an average, snarky teenage girl

and honestly the setting does nothing for me
it's zombie apocalypse, but it's so standard

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549fa52263687244b7810100#post_549fa52263687244b7810100

One of the bullet points was the crafting system, it does look pretty good from what I saw, but then came another side that listed several games (Diablo and Far Cry amongst them) that had a much better crafting system and that the one in the game was good but nothing oustanding like many claimed.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549fa4966368723f90e00100#post_549fa4966368723f90e00100
and yet
everyone i know who's played it, loves it, say it's the best game of 2013
and you know what, the opening is great, i cried like everyone else, it worked

but the characters after that just aren't interesting
maybe i need to keep going, so they get more developed, and i care more

but the gameplay itself isn't really special either
standard stealth shooter
sneak around most things
shoot as last resort
and of course see-through walls ability, that joel has for some reason

it's hilarious actually
the first time you have to fight humans, you walk into an area, filled with obvious waist high cover walls
like it's the first thing i notice when i walk in, and i think, oh this is a fight scene
thinking about that really breaks immersion
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a
